formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SayUnixTime' =-
[Synopsis] Says a specified time in a custom format
[Description] SayUnixTime([unixtime][|[timezone][|format]]) unixtime: time, in seconds since Jan 1, 1970. May be negative. defaults to now. timezone: timezone, see /usr/share/zoneinfo for a list. defaults to machine default. format: a format the time is to be said in. See voicemail.conf. defaults to "ABdY 'digits/at' IMp"

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

May be negative. + SayUnixTime([unixtime][,[timezone][,format]]) + unixtime - time, in seconds since Jan 1, 1970. May be negative. defaults to now. - timezone: timezone, see /usr/share/zoneinfo for a list. + timezone - timezone, see /usr/share/zoneinfo for a list. defaults to machine default. - format: a format the time is to be said in. See voicemail.conf. + format - a format the time is to be said in. See voicemail.conf. defaults to "ABdY 'digits/at' IMp"
